name: ColorSeeker
description:
THIS IS A BULLET HELL GAME. MEANT TO BE HARD ;) 

How to play:

A/D/left arrow/right arrow: Move left/right

W/Space/up arrow: Jump

Mouse Left Click: Shoot

1/2/3 (not numpad): change to different colors, 1-red, 2-green, 3-blue

Gameplay:

There are minions spawn as time goes, and two bosses. Initially, your have no color power so you are in pale white. You can absorb colors by defeating minions. 

Press 1/2/3 to switch Player's color form. If you are the same color as the minions' or bosses' attacks, you take NO damage and charge your weapon of that COLOR. 

E.g. you press 1 to switch to RED form, you can now run into the RED bullets from the enemies and charge your RED gun. Once your RED gun is charged (you should see it on the top left corner), you can shoot special RED bullets when you are in RED form. Same thing applies on GREEN form and BLUE form.

RED: big red bullet that can destroy all minions and bullets it passes through, and do nice damage.

GREEN: hold left click to keep casting green beam and do continuous damage.

BLUE: shot gun of 3 bullets. 

The goal is to utilize different color weapons to defeat the bosses.

This game is submitted to MINI JAM 62 0202. A Use WASD to move, jump, mouse to fire, space to change color to white, and fire regular bullet, different color different type of bullets, same color as bullet captures the bullet. Try to defeat our bosses. And Hope you guys had fun playing this game. CHEERS !!!
